name: LoveNotes
0:
”Alexa, open Love Notes”
”Alexa, start Love Notes”
”Alexa, run Love Notes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love notes
des:
Want to do something romantic for the love of your life? First, you must secretly activate this skill. Then, you can very easily leave a note on the refrigerator, scrap of paper, SMS message, Facebook, Twitter (or anywhere else you can think of that is cute) and simply tell the one you love to say "Alexa, open Love Notes!"

From there, the skill will say any number of heart warming things to your significant other. There are over 100 different love notes, so he/she can say it over and over again when you aren't around to remind them how much you care about them. This is the perfect skill for Valentines Day, Anniversaries, those who work long nights or away from home a lot, and of course... anyone who wants to tell their sweetheart that they care.
 
This skill was authored by Drew Blanke of www.DrBlankenstein.com, if you enjoyed it please leave positive feedback and follow @Dr_Blankenstein. Enjoy the skill...Make LOVE, Not WAR!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
